channel.title: How can I make it so a key can open a door
channel.description:
Hey guys. Just a quick question here. How do I make a key open a door ? For example : I tele to Annakarl and there's a kbd. I can make it so he can drop the key. However, west of kbd, there's a door there. I can't open it. How can I make it so the "key" can open the door ( Only that key, noting else).
That's it, quick reply asap would be appreciated. Thanks in advance. ;)
~ Macoronizer

item.title: How can I make it so a key can open a door
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Object Click One packet.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I make it so a key can open a door

item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

item.title: How can I make it so a key can open a door
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case id: if (!hasItem(id)) { Send("The door is locked."); return; } Send("You insert the key into the lock..."); ReplaceObject(ObjectX, ObjectY, id, face); Send("...and the door opens."); break;

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so a key can open a door

item.title: How can I make it so a key can open a door
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

okay You’re going to make or edit the objects case.

meaning something like

Case ####: (id of the Object)
Coding
Coding
Coding
break;

If you don’t get that ^^^ Use the search bar or wait for someone to fill in the blanks.

Read full topic
